cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.GT, cs.RO 

Reasoning: The paper deals with optimization problems involving Markov chains, which are commonly studied in the sub-fields of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of combinatorial constraints suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-field of algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The paper also mentions the use of linear programming relaxation, which is a common technique in optimization and game theory (cs.GT). Finally, the paper deals with the design of algorithms, which is a topic that falls under the sub-field of robotics (cs.RO).
